title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Oct 20 2022
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Oct 20 2022
description:
The best Halloween candies. When Buck asked, Clay teased: "It's a family ensemble Halloween costume this year -- that's a little bit of a hint." Marist poll: parents of school-aged kids favor GOP by nearly 70%. CDC votes to recommend covid shot be included in required vaccines for schools. NYC to reopen nuclear fallout shelters? Clay and Buck talk with Special Forces Vet and Gold Star husband Joe Kent, Trump-endorsed America First congressional candidate for Washington's 3rd district, who Clay called a kick-ass candidate and says we'll be hearing a lot about after this election. Bizarro C&B: The Joe Biden & John Fetterman Show. Clay's dad joke.

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
